text: It appears that someone drank from these glasses. You mark the location of the glasses with an appropriate description in the protocol and on the evidence label, take a photograph, and assign a reference number. What do you do with them next?
option1: Lift the glasses in a standard manner and place them into a properly labeled container.
option2: You leave the glasses and do nothing.
option3: You find fingerprints after applying powder, which you note in the protocol. Lift the glasses carefully to preserve the fingerprints, and place them into a properly labeled container.
option4: Zostawiasz szklanki i nic nie robisz
